?en: If you don't understand the meaning of the configuration, don't change anything
?warning-zh: 如果不懂配置含义什么都别改

FLASK.?DEBUG_RELOADER-en: Frame debugging-automatic restart: open the program will start twice, closed loses the automatic restart function
FLASK.?DEBUG_RELOADER-zh: 框架调试-自动重启：开启 程序会启动两次，关闭失去自动重启功能

LOG.?SHOW_DEBUG_LOG-en: Output debug information in the console and log files
LOG.?SHOW_DEBUG_LOG-zh: 控制台和日志文件中输出debug信息
LOG.?SHOW_INFO_LOG-en: Output info information in the console and log files
LOG.?SHOW_INFO_LOG-zh: 控制台和日志文件中输出info信息
LOG.?LOG_FILE_MAX_DAY-en: Maximum number of days after log expiration
LOG.?LOG_FILE_MAX_COUNT-en: Maximum number of log files for the day
LOG.?LOG_FILE_MAX_COUNT-zh: 当天日志文件最大数量

PUBLIC.?DRIVER-en: Edge, Chrome, Firefox (choose one of three)

EDGE_CHROME.?MANAGED_DEFAULT_CONTENT_SETTINGS_IMAGES: 1 with image mode / 2 without image mode
1 有图模式 / 2 无图模式
EDGE_CHROME.?HEADLESS-en: Headless mode true disabled false enabled
EDGE_CHROME.?HEADLESS-zh: 无头模式 true禁用 false 启用
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_GPU-en: Disable GPU acceleration true enable false disable
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_GPU-zh: 禁用GPU加速 true启用 false禁用
EDGE_CHROME.?NO_SANDBOX-en: Sandbox mode operation true enabled false disabled
EDGE_CHROME.?NO_SANDBOX-zh: 沙盒模式运行 true启用 false禁用
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_SETUID_SANDBOX-en: Disable sandbox true enable false disable
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_SETUID_SANDBOX-zh: 禁用沙盒 true启用 false禁用
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_DEV_SHM_USAGE-en: Write /tmp instead of /dev/shm when a large number of renderings true enable false disable
EDGE_CHROME.?DISABLE_DEV_SHM_USAGE-zh: 大量渲染时候写入/tmp而非/dev/shm true启用 false禁用
EDGE_CHROME.?LOG_LEVEL-en: Log output level log-level= | INFO >= 0 WARNING >= 1 LOG_ERROR >= 2 LOG_FATAL >= 3 default is 0
EDGE_CHROME.?LOG_LEVEL-zh: 日志输出级别 log-level= | INFO >= 0 WARNING >= 1 LOG_ERROR >= 2 LOG_FATAL >= 3 default is 0
